column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For our entrees we had the steak frites (nicely prepared and very nice presentation)
column3: but still a wonderful 16 oz. steak)
column4: and the 42-day dry aged 22 oz. ribeye (shared by two of us
column5: and a wonderful tasting sensation). We also shared sides of corn (very nice
column7: mashed potatoes (easily the best of the sides)
column10: and creamed spinach (weighing in at second best of the sides). Other highlights were the very slightly sour dough bread (thick crust). The wine list was very nice and won't require your first born son to afford.
